msbt.message: Tom Nook's doing sign-ups for a DIY demo session if you're interested. You should check it out!It's about using stuff around the island to make furniture, so you're gonna want some tips, .I don't know about you, but I get REALLY attached to the stuff I make. I just like using it more.I bet you'd rock at DIY. You'll be making cool stuff in no time! Go talk to Tom Nook!

I kinda moved here on a whim, and I'm not sure I brought enough Bells with me, .Like, you hear "deserted island" and you think you're not even gonna NEED money. Yeah, I need a plan.Hmm I heard I can get Bells selling fruits and weeds and stuff to Timmy. If I do that, maybe I'll be alright.

Word is that, except for the plaza, we're allowed to plop furniture down wherever and whenever we like!I kinda wanna stick a bench and a vending machine somewhere. To like, make a cool hang-out spot for folks.What about you? I say if you've got an idea for the island, then go make it happen, !

If you ever run out of something you need, Timmy's is the place to go to buy more.He'll also buy up your spare lumber and weeds in case you're strapped for Bells.He's totally upfront with his prices too, so it's really easy to work out a deal, .
